column1: * 1917 - Edith Tolkien writes her first letter to her husband at Thirtle Bridge army camp
column2: near Withernsea from her new lodgings in Hornsea.  The letter was re-directed to Hornsea Musketry Camp.

column1: * 1977 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography is first published in the UK.
* 2009 - The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún is published.
* 2010 - The wikipedia:Americas Next Top Model episode "Hobbits vs. Models" premières on wikipedia:The CW Television Network.
* 2011 - English and Medieval Studies Presented to J.R.R. Tolkien on the Occasion of his Seventieth Birthday is made available as a print-on-demand publication from HarperCollins.
:There are no known events for this day.Category:Datesfi:5. toukokuuta
